alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Union (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 12:20PM EST until February 13 at 10:20AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Shawneetown. .While the river at Shawneetown is still in minor flood, it has already crested, and is falling now. It is forecast to fall below flood stage late tonight. For the Ohio River...including Shawneetown...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Shawneetown. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 33.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs affecting mainly bottomland and surrounding low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CST Saturday the stage was 34.6 feet. - Forecast...The river has already crested, and is now falling. It will fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 33.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
